title: Explore Dawn theme file structure and key directories
description: Document the purpose and contents of key directories: /assets/, /sections/, /snippets/, /templates/, /layout/, /config/. Focus on understanding the organization and identifying critical files for lingerie customizations.
notes:
## Dawn Theme File Structure Exploration

### /assets/ (185 files)
**Purpose:** Static files - CSS, JavaScript, images, fonts

**Key CSS Files:**
- base.css (80KB) - Core styles, typography, layout
- component-*.css (50+ files) - Component-specific styles
  - component-card.css, component-product-variant-picker.css
  - component-facets.css (filtering)
  - component-cart-*.css (cart drawer, notification, items)
- section-*.css (20+ files) - Section-specific styles
  - section-main-product.css (CRITICAL for product page)
  - section-image-banner.css, section-multicolumn.css

**Key JavaScript Files:**
- global.js - Core theme functionality
- product-*.js - Product page interaction
  - product-form.js, product-info.js, media-gallery.js
- cart*.js - Cart functionality (cart.js, cart-drawer.js, cart-notification.js)
- quick-add.js - Quick add to cart
- predictive-search.js - Search autocomplete

### /sections/ (54 files)
**Purpose:** Modular, configurable components (Online Store 2.0)

**Critical for Lingerie:**
- main-product.liquid (99KB) - MAIN PRODUCT PAGE
  - Image gallery, variant picker, buy buttons
  - Includes schema for customization
- main-collection-product-grid.liquid (15KB) - COLLECTION LISTING
  - Product grid, filtering integration
- featured-product.liquid (64KB) - Featured product sections

**Other Important Sections:**
- header.liquid, footer.liquid - Site navigation
- cart-*.liquid - Cart sections
- collapsible-content.liquid - Accordions (for size charts?)
- related-products.liquid - Recommendations
- image-with-text.liquid, multicolumn.liquid - Content blocks

### /snippets/ (37 files)
**Purpose:** Reusable code fragments

**Critical for Lingerie:**
- card-product.liquid (34KB) - PRODUCT CARD for collections
  - Used in grids, quick view
- product-media-gallery.liquid (15KB) - Image gallery logic
- product-thumbnail.liquid - Thumbnail navigation
- product-variant-picker.liquid - Size/variant selection
- buy-buttons.liquid - Add to cart buttons
- price.liquid - Price display

**Other Important Snippets:**
- facets.liquid (48KB) - Filtering system
- cart-drawer.liquid (30KB) - Cart drawer UI
- header-*.liquid - Navigation components
- icon-*.liquid - Icon system

### /templates/ (14 files + customers subdirectory)
**Purpose:** JSON templates defining page structure (Online Store 2.0)

**Structure:** Templates reference sections and define their settings
- product.json (177 lines) - Product page template
  - References main-product section
  - Includes collapsible tabs for Materials, Shipping, Dimensions, Care
  - Related products section
  - Image-with-text section
  - Gallery layout: 'stacked', media size: 'large'
- collection.json - Collection page template
- index.json - Homepage
- cart.json, search.json, page.json

**Customers subdirectory:**
- account.json, login.json, addresses.json, order.json, register.json
- activate_account.json, reset_password.json

### /layout/ (2 files)
**Purpose:** Main wrapper templates

- theme.liquid (22KB) - MAIN LAYOUT
  - Wraps all pages
  - Includes <head>, scripts, stylesheets
  - Header/footer sections
- password.liquid (14KB) - Password-protected store layout

### /config/ (2 files)
**Purpose:** Theme settings and customization

- settings_schema.json (40KB) - THEME SETTINGS SCHEMA
  - Defines all theme customization options in Shopify admin
  - Color schemes, typography, spacing, buttons, cards, etc.
  - Current: 5 color schemes, Assistant font family
- settings_data.json (6KB) - Current theme settings data
  - Active preset: 'Default'
  - Colors, fonts, layout values
  - Cart type: 'notification'
  - Page width: 1200px

## Key Insights for Lingerie Customization

**Product Photography (7+ images):**
- Modify: sections/main-product.liquid
- Snippet: snippets/product-media-gallery.liquid
- Template: templates/product.json (gallery_layout setting)
- Currently: 'stacked' layout with 'large' media size

**Size Charts:**
- Potential: Use collapsible-content.liquid section
- Or: Create new section (sections/size-chart.liquid)
- Already has collapsible tabs in product.json

**Product Cards (Collection Pages):**
- Modify: snippets/card-product.liquid (34KB - complex)
- Section: sections/main-collection-product-grid.liquid
- Template: templates/collection.json

**Filtering:**
- Already integrated: snippets/facets.liquid (48KB)
- Uses Shopify Search & Discovery
- Highly customizable

**Return Policy:**
- Could use existing collapsible tabs
- Or create custom section

## Next Steps
1. Deep dive into sections/main-product.liquid structure
2. Analyze product media gallery implementation
3. Test with 7+ product images
4. Document customization points

title: Analyze main-product.liquid implementation
description: Deep dive into /sections/main-product.liquid to understand: current image gallery implementation, variant selector structure, product information layout, and mobile vs desktop responsive behavior. Document findings for later customization.
notes:
## main-product.liquid Deep Analysis

### File Overview
- **Location:** sections/main-product.liquid
- **Size:** 2,268 lines
- **Dependencies:** 
  - CSS: section-main-product.css, component-accordion.css, component-price.css, component-slider.css, component-rating.css, component-deferred-media.css, component-product-variant-picker.css
  - JS: product-info.js, product-form.js, magnify.js (optional), theme-editor.js (design mode)
  - Snippets: product-media-gallery.liquid, product-variant-picker.liquid, buy-buttons.liquid, price.liquid

### Image Gallery Implementation

**Architecture:**
- Main gallery wrapper: <media-gallery> custom element (sections/main-product.liquid:79)
- Gallery snippet: snippets/product-media-gallery.liquid (333 lines)
- JavaScript: assets/media-gallery.js (not analyzed yet)

**Gallery Layout Options (configurable via settings):**
1. **stacked** (default) - Vertical stack of images
2. **columns** - Grid columns
3. **thumbnail** - Large image with thumbnail navigation
4. **thumbnail_slider** - Slider with thumbnail navigation

**Media Handling:**
- Renders featured media first (variant-specific image)
- Loops through all product.media items
- Supports multiple media types: image, video, external_video, model (3D)
- Lazy loading for images after position 1
- Responsive image widths: '54, 74, 104, 162, 208, 324, 416'

**Thumbnail Navigation:**
- Displayed when gallery_layout contains 'thumbnail' OR mobile_thumbnails == 'show'
- Slider component with prev/next buttons
- 3 thumbnails step for navigation (data-step="3")
- Hidden navigation buttons when media_count <= 3 (small), <= 4 (medium-up)
- Thumbnail size: max 416px width

**Mobile Gallery:**
- Slider with swipe gestures (slider-component)
- Slider counter showing current/total (e.g., "1 / 7")
- Mobile thumbnails options: 'columns', 'show', 'hide' (default: hide)
- Responsive slider buttons (hidden on small screens when few images)

**Zoom Options:**
1. **lightbox** (default) - Click to open modal (product-media-modal.liquid)
2. **hover** - Magnify on hover (magnify.js)
3. **none** - No zoom

**Key Settings (from schema):**
- enable_sticky_info: true (gallery sticks on scroll)
- media_size: small/medium/large (default: large)
  - large: 65% width on desktop (990px+)
  - medium: 55% width
  - small: 45% width
- constrain_to_viewport: true (keeps images in viewport)
- media_fit: contain/cover (default: contain)
- hide_variants: false (show/hide variant-specific images)
- enable_video_looping: false

**Critical for 7+ Images:**
- Current implementation supports unlimited images
- Thumbnail slider has pagination when > 4 images
- Mobile slider always enabled when multiple images
- No visible issues with many images in default setup

### Variant Selector Implementation

**Architecture:**
- Wrapper: <variant-selects> custom element
- Snippet: snippets/product-variant-picker.liquid (95 lines)
- Renders unless product.has_only_default_variant

**Picker Types:**
1. **button** (default in product.json) - Pill-style buttons
2. **dropdown** - Select dropdown
3. **swatch** - Color/pattern swatches (auto-enabled if swatch data exists)
4. **swatch_dropdown** - Dropdown with swatch preview

**Swatch Support:**
- Auto-detects if option.values have swatch data
- Configurable swatch_shape (from block.settings)
- Uses snippets/swatch.liquid for rendering

**For Lingerie (Size Selection):**
- Currently configured as "button" picker (templates/product.json:29)
- Good for size options (S/M/L or 32A, 34B, etc.)
- Could also use dropdown for many size combinations

**Variant Selection Flow:**
1. User selects option (e.g., Size: 32B)
2. variant-selects updates selected variant
3. JSON data stored in script tag (data-selected-variant)
4. product-form.js updates price, availability, images
5. Hidden input updated with variant.id

### Product Information Layout

**Two-Column Grid:**
- Mobile: Single column (< 750px)
- Tablet+: Two columns (>= 750px)
- Desktop: Adjustable ratio based on media_size

**Left Column (product__media-wrapper):**
- Media gallery
- Width: 65% (large), 55% (medium), 45% (small) on desktop

**Right Column (product__info-wrapper):**
- Product info blocks (configurable order)
- Sticky positioning on desktop (top: 3rem)
- Width: 35% (large), 45% (medium), 55% (small) on desktop
- Padding: 5rem left on desktop (8rem if extra padding)

**Block Types (all configurable via JSON template):**
1. **text** - Custom text (vendor, caption, subtitle)
2. **title** - Product title (h1)
3. **price** - Price display with badges, taxes, installments
4. **inventory** - Stock status with color indicators
5. **description** - Product description (HTML)
6. **sku** - Product SKU
7. **variant_picker** - Size/color/variant selector
8. **quantity_selector** - Quantity input with +/- buttons
9. **buy_buttons** - Add to cart + dynamic checkout
10. **collapsible_tab** - Accordion (Materials, Shipping, Dimensions, Care)
11. **popup** - Modal trigger
12. **share** - Social share buttons
13. **rating** - Product reviews rating (metafield-based)
14. **custom_liquid** - Custom Liquid code
15. **@app** - Third-party app blocks

**Current Block Order (product.json):**
1. Vendor
2. Title
3. Caption (metafield: product.metafields.descriptors.subtitle)
4. Price
5. Variant picker
6. Quantity selector
7. Buy buttons
8. Description
9. Collapsible tabs (Materials, Shipping, Dimensions, Care)
10. Share

**Collapsible Tabs (PERFECT for Size Charts!):**
- Already implemented with icon support
- 44 icon options (including: ruler, shirt, silhouette, heart, truck)
- Can reference Shopify pages OR custom content
- Expandable/collapsible with smooth animation

### Mobile vs Desktop Responsive Behavior

**Breakpoints:**
- **Mobile:** < 750px
- **Tablet:** 750px - 989px
- **Desktop:** >= 990px

**Mobile (<750px):**
- Single column layout
- Gallery slider with swipe gestures
- Slider counter (e.g., "1 / 7")
- Thumbnails hidden by default (configurable)
- Full-width product info
- Padding: 75% of desktop values

**Tablet (750px+):**
- Two-column grid
- Sticky info column (top: 3rem)
- Gallery slider buttons hidden
- Product info padding: 5rem left

**Desktop (990px+):**
- Optimized column widths based on media_size
- Large media: 65% gallery / 35% info
- Medium media: 55% gallery / 45% info  
- Small media: 45% gallery / 55% info
- Full padding applied

**Responsive Classes:**
- .small-hide - Hidden on mobile
- .medium-hide - Hidden on tablet
- .large-up-hide - Hidden on desktop

### Key Customization Points for Lingerie

**1. Image Gallery (7+ images):**
- KEEP: Current gallery_layout (stacked or thumbnail_slider best)
- CONSIDER: thumbnail_slider for better navigation with many images
- ADD: Custom labels on images ("Front", "Back", "Side", "Detail")
- MODIFY: Thumbnail navigation to show more thumbnails at once

**2. Model Information Display:**
- CREATE: New block type "model_info" 
- OR USE: Custom_liquid block in product.json
- DISPLAY: Model height, measurements, size worn
- LOCATION: After variant_picker, before quantity_selector

**3. Size Chart Integration:**
- USE: Existing collapsible_tab block
- CONFIGURE: Icon: "ruler" or "silhouette"
- HEADING: "Size Chart & Fit Guide"
- CONTENT: Link to Shopify page with size chart tables
- OR: Embed size chart HTML directly in content field

**4. Fit Notes:**
- USE: Text block OR collapsible_tab
- CONTENT: Product metafield (e.g., product.metafields.fit.description)
- EXAMPLE: "This style runs small. We recommend sizing up."

**5. Variant Picker (Bras):**
- CHALLENGE: Shopify variants limited to 100 (3 options max)
- SOLUTION: 
  - Option 1: Band Size (28-42)
  - Option 2: Cup Size (AA-K)
  - Option 3: Color
- PICKER: Keep button type for clarity
- CONSIDER: Custom variant picker for better UX with many sizes

**6. Return Policy:**
- USE: Collapsible_tab block
- ICON: "return" or "truck"
- HEADING: "Returns & Hygiene Policy"
- CONTENT: Reference policy page
- LOCATION: After description

### Critical Files to Modify
1. **templates/product.json** - Block configuration, settings
2. **sections/main-product.liquid** - Add model_info block type
3. **snippets/product-media-gallery.liquid** - Gallery enhancements (optional)
4. **assets/section-main-product.css** - Styling tweaks
5. **config/settings_schema.json** - Theme-wide settings (if needed)

### Current Settings (from product.json)
- gallery_layout: 'stacked'
- media_size: 'large' (65% width)
- enable_sticky_info: true
- mobile_thumbnails: 'hide'
- constrain_to_viewport: true
- hide_variants: true
- enable_video_looping: false
- image_zoom: (not set, defaults to 'lightbox')

### Recommended Changes for June Lingerie
1. Change gallery_layout to 'thumbnail_slider' for better 7+ image navigation
2. Add size chart collapsible_tab with ruler icon
3. Add fit notes text block using product metafield
4. Create model info custom_liquid block
5. Add return policy collapsible_tab
6. Test with actual lingerie products (bra variants, 7+ images)

### Next Steps
1. Test gallery with 7+ images in dev store
2. Create sample size chart page in Shopify
3. Set up product metafields for fit notes
4. Experiment with gallery_layout options
5. Design model info display format

title: Analyze collection page and product card implementation
description:
## Collection Page & Product Card Analysis

### File Overview
- **Main section:** sections/main-collection-product-grid.liquid (411 lines)
- **Product card:** snippets/card-product.liquid (624 lines)
- **Filtering:** snippets/facets.liquid (937 lines)
- **Dependencies:**
  - CSS: template-collection.css, component-card.css, component-price.css, component-facets.css, quick-add.css
  - JS: facets.js, quick-add.js, product-form.js, quick-add-bulk.js

---

## Grid Structure & Responsive Breakpoints

### Grid System (base.css:926-1038)

**Breakpoints:**
- **Mobile:** < 750px
- **Tablet:** 750px - 989px
- **Desktop:** >= 990px

**Grid Classes:**
- .grid--1-col: 1 column (100% width)
- .grid--2-col: 2 columns (50% each)
- .grid--3-col: 3 columns (33.33% each)
- .grid--4-col-tablet: 4 columns on tablet (25% each)
- .grid--2-col-desktop through .grid--6-col-desktop: 2-6 columns on desktop

**Current Settings (main-collection-product-grid.liquid:150-151):**
- Desktop: grid--{{ columns_desktop }}-col-desktop (default: 4 columns)
- Mobile: grid--{{ columns_mobile }}-col-tablet-down (default: 2 columns)

**Schema Settings (line 202-236):**
- products_per_page: 8-36, step 4, default 16
- columns_desktop: 1-6, default 4
- columns_mobile: 1 or 2, default 2

**Grid Spacing:**
- Mobile: var(--grid-mobile-horizontal-spacing)
- Desktop: var(--grid-desktop-horizontal-spacing)

---

## Product Card Layout (card-product.liquid)

### Card Structure

**Main Components:**
1. **Card wrapper** (line 43)
   - .card-wrapper.product-card-wrapper
   - Contains entire card

2. **Card inner** (line 44-59)
   - .card--{{ settings.card_style }} (standard or card)
   - Color scheme support
   - Image shape support (default, arch, blob, chevronleft, etc.)
   - Ratio-based sizing

3. **Card media** (line 60-108)
   - Primary image with responsive srcset
   - Widths: 165w, 360w, 533w, 720w, 940w, 1066w
   - Secondary image on hover (if show_secondary_image: true)
   - Lazy loading (except first 2 products)

4. **Card content** (line 109-145)
   - Product title (h3.card__heading)
   - Vendor (optional, line 164-167)
   - Product rating (optional, line 171-205)
   - Price display (line 207)
   - Volume pricing (line 208-288)
   - Badges (Sold Out / On Sale, line 127-143)

5. **Quick add** (optional, line 292-299)
   - None, standard, or bulk
   - Standard: Quick add button
   - Bulk: Quantity selector in card

### Card Settings (from schema)

**Image Options:**
- image_ratio: adapt/portrait/square (default: adapt)
- image_shape: default/arch/blob/chevronleft/chevronright/diamond/parallelogram/round
- show_secondary_image: boolean (default: false)

**Display Options:**
- show_vendor: boolean (default: false)
- show_rating: boolean (default: false) - requires metafields.reviews.rating
- quick_add: none/standard/bulk (default: none)

**Card Styling (from settings):**
- card_style: standard/card
- card_color_scheme: scheme-1, scheme-2, etc.
- badge_position: bottom left (configurable)
- sale_badge_color_scheme
- sold_out_badge_color_scheme

### Responsive Images

**Sizes attribute (line 75):**
- Page width 1200px: ~267px (4-col)
- Desktop 990px+: calc((100vw - 130px) / 4) (4-col)
- Tablet 750px+: calc((100vw - 120px) / 3) (3-col)
- Mobile: calc((100vw - 35px) / 2) (2-col)

**Secondary Image on Hover (line 86-105):**
- Only renders if card_product.media[1] exists
- Same responsive srcset as primary
- Always lazy loaded
- CSS handles hover effect

---

## Filtering System (facets.liquid)

### Filter Types (main-collection-product-grid.liquid:360-377)

1. **horizontal** (default)
   - Filters displayed horizontally above products
   - facets__form class

2. **vertical**
   - Sidebar layout
   - facets__form-vertical class
   - Active filter pills
   - "Clear all" button

3. **drawer**
   - Mobile-friendly drawer
   - Opens on filter button click

### Filter Components

**Shopify Native Filters (via Search & Discovery app):**
- Built-in to Shopify (free)
- Up to 25 filter options
- Filter types supported:
  - List filters (checkboxes)
  - Swatch filters (color/pattern)
  - Price range (min/max slider)
  - Boolean filters

**Active Filters Display (facets.liquid:58-73):**
- Shows currently applied filters
- Each filter is a pill with X to remove
- "Clear all" link
- Updates via AJAX (no page reload)

**Filter Options (facets.liquid):**
- Checkbox inputs for list filters
- Swatch inputs for color/pattern
- Price range inputs
- "Show more" functionality for long lists

**JavaScript (facets.js):**
- AJAX form submission
- URL param updates
- Filter removal
- Loading states

### Sorting Options (line 42-98)

**Sort dropdown:**
- Best selling
- Alphabetically A-Z / Z-A
- Price low to high / high to low
- Date old to new / new to old

**Location:**
- Vertical filter: Top of sidebar
- Horizontal filter: Above product grid
- Mobile: In drawer

---

## Collection Page Structure

### Layout Flow (main-collection-product-grid.liquid)

1. **Pagination wrapper** (line 40)
   - paginate collection.products by products_per_page

2. **Sort (vertical only)** (line 42-98)
   - facet-filters-form
   - Sort dropdown
   - Product count

3. **Main container** (line 100)
   - Conditional class: facets-vertical page-width

4. **Filters sidebar** (line 104-118)
   - Renders facets snippet
   - Conditional based on enable_filtering

5. **Product grid container** (line 120-126)
   - .product-grid-container
   - Animation: scroll-trigger animate--slide-in

6. **Product grid** (line 146-183)
   - <ul id="product-grid">
   - Grid classes applied
   - Renders card-product for each product
   - Lazy load after first 2 products

7. **Pagination** (line 185-187)
   - Renders if more than 1 page

### Empty Collection (line 127-140)

- Shows when collection.products.size == 0
- Message: "No products found"
- Link to clear filters

---

## Lingerie-Specific Considerations

### Product Card Enhancements

**1. Secondary Image on Hover** ✅ BUILT-IN
- Enable show_secondary_image: true
- Shows back/side view on hover
- Perfect for lingerie (front + back)

**2. Quick View/Quick Add**
- Standard quick add: Modal with product details
- Bulk quick add: Quantity selector in card
- CONSIDER: Standard quick add for size selection

**3. Size Display in Card**
- Currently only shows: Title, Price, Vendor, Rating
- NEED: Available sizes indicator
- OPTION 1: Add custom text via product metafield
- OPTION 2: Modify card-product.liquid to show variant options

**4. Badge Customization**
- Already has: Sold Out, On Sale
- COULD ADD: New Arrival, Best Seller, Limited Edition
- Location: line 127-143 in card-product.liquid

**5. Image Ratio**
- portrait: Better for full-body lingerie shots
- square: Consistent grid, more products visible
- adapt: Uses actual image ratio (can be inconsistent)
- RECOMMEND: portrait for lingerie

### Filtering for Lingerie

**Critical Filters (via Shopify admin):**
1. **Size** (list filter)
   - Band size: 28, 30, 32, 34, 36, 38, 40, 42
   - Cup size: AA, A, B, C, D, DD, DDD, G, H, etc.
   - OR combined: 32A, 32B, 34A, 34B, etc.
   - OR general: XS, S, M, L, XL

2. **Style** (list filter with swatches optional)
   - Bra: Push-up, T-shirt, Balconette, Plunge, etc.
   - Underwear: Thong, Bikini, Brief, Boyshort, etc.
   - Loungewear: Chemise, Robe, etc.

3. **Color** (swatch filter)
   - Visual color swatches
   - Black, White, Nude, Red, Pink, Blue, etc.

4. **Material** (list filter)
   - Lace, Satin, Cotton, Mesh, Silk, etc.

5. **Coverage** (list filter)
   - Full, Moderate, Minimal

6. **Price** (price range filter)
   - Min/max slider

**Filter Configuration:**
- Done in Shopify admin → Search & Discovery app
- Product tags OR product metafields
- Swatch colors configured per value

### Grid Settings Recommendation

**Desktop:**
- 4 columns (default) - Good balance
- OR 3 columns if images need more space
- Products per page: 16 (default) - Good for SEO and performance

**Mobile:**
- 2 columns (default) - Standard for lingerie
- Allows adequate image size

**Image Settings:**
- image_ratio: portrait (recommended)
- show_secondary_image: true (show back view)
- image_shape: default (no mask, clean professional look)

---

## Critical Files for Lingerie Customization

1. **templates/collection.json**
   - Configure grid settings
   - Enable/disable features
   - Set defaults

2. **snippets/card-product.liquid**
   - Add size availability indicator (line 169 area)
   - Customize badges (line 127-143)
   - Add fit notes display

3. **sections/main-collection-product-grid.liquid**
   - Minimal changes needed
   - Already well-structured

4. **assets/component-card.css**
   - Style customizations
   - Hover effects
   - Badge styling

5. **Shopify Admin → Search & Discovery**
   - Configure filters
   - Set up color swatches
   - Define filter groups

---

## Current vs Recommended Settings

**Current (likely defaults):**
- columns_desktop: 4
- columns_mobile: 2
- products_per_page: 16
- image_ratio: adapt
- show_secondary_image: false
- show_vendor: false
- show_rating: false
- quick_add: none
- filter_type: horizontal
- enable_filtering: true
- enable_sorting: true

**Recommended for June Lingerie:**
- columns_desktop: 4 (keep)
- columns_mobile: 2 (keep)
- products_per_page: 16 (keep)
- image_ratio: portrait ← CHANGE
- show_secondary_image: true ← CHANGE
- show_vendor: false (keep)
- show_rating: false (keep, unless using reviews)
- quick_add: standard ← CONSIDER (for size selection)
- filter_type: vertical ← CONSIDER (better for many filters)
- enable_filtering: true (keep)
- enable_sorting: true (keep)

---

## Next Steps

1. Configure filters in Shopify admin
2. Set up color swatches
3. Test collection page with sample lingerie products
4. Modify card-product.liquid to show size availability
5. Configure collection.json with recommended settings
6. Test mobile responsive behavior
7. Add custom badges if needed (New, Best Seller)
8. Consider adding fit notes to product cards

title: Test Dawn theme with sample products and multiple images

title: Document Dawn theme customization points and settings
